game.logic

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the level that the game is played on.
    Author:
    Cameron Bryers 3000326848 MMXV, Callum Gill 300316407 2015

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(java.lang.String username,
                       double x,
                       double y,
                       double z,
                       double rot)
        Move a player in the world given a 3D vector.
        Parameters:
        username - - username of player to be moved
        x - - player's x coordinate (Tile x, Renderer x)
        y - - player's y coordinate (Tile y, Renderer z)
        z - - player's z coordinate (Tile z, Renderer y)
        rot - - rotation around (z axis -> Tile, y axis -> Renderer)

      • movePlayer

        @Deprecated
public void movePlayer(int id,
                                   double x,
                                   double y,
                                   double z,
                                   double rot)
        Deprecated. 
        Move a player in the level given their ID. Could not make this work over the server, Do not use.
        Parameters:
        username - - player to be moved
        x - - player's x coordinate
        z - - player's z coordinate
        rot - - player's rotation around the y axis

      • handleInteract

        public void handleInteract(java.lang.String username,
                           int ID)
        Handles an interact packet sent from the server. Interactions are then performed by the appropriate player on the appropriate tile.
        Parameters:
        username - - username of the player interacting
        ID - - ID of the tile to interact with

      • handlePickUp

        public void handlePickUp(java.lang.String username,
                         int tileID,
                         int itemID)
        Handles a pickup packet from the server. The level then gives the appropriate player the item parsed in the packet.
        Parameters:
        username - - username of the player picking up the item
        tileID - - ID of the tile that the item was on
        itemID - - ID of the item to be picked up

      • handleDamage

        public void handleDamage(java.lang.String username,
                         double damage)
        Handles a damage packet from the server. The method then gives the appropriate amount of damage to the appropriate player.
        Parameters:
        username - - username of player affected
        damage - - amount of damage to deal

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Go through each player and check what action they are doing. Also, go through each tile and update it.

      • setTeams

        public void setTeams(java.lang.String[] players,
                     java.lang.String[] teams)
        Set the teams and assign the players models according to their teams.
        Parameters:
        players - - array of player usernames.
        teams - - team allocating, "0" for guard and "1" for spy.
